checkpoint.name: Instruments are packed as per standard protocol
checkpoint.meansOfVerification: Check for Window of autoclave drum is closed, drum is not filled more than 3/4th, instruments are not hinged,

checkpoint.name: Autoclaving of instruments is done as per protocols
checkpoint.meansOfVerification: Ask staff about temperature, pressure and time

checkpoint.name: Regular validation of sterilization through chemical indicators
checkpoint.meansOfVerification: Indicators (temperature sensitive tape) that change colour after being exposed to certain temperature.

checkpoint.name: Chemical sterilization of instruments/equipment's is done as per protocols
checkpoint.meansOfVerification: Ask staff about method, concentration and contact time required for chemical sterilization.

checkpoint.name: There is a procedure to ensure the traceability of sterilized packs
checkpoint.meansOfVerification: Each Sterilized pack is marked with Date/Time of sterilization, contents, name/signature of the Technician,

checkpoint.name: Sterility of autoclaved packs is maintained during storage
checkpoint.meansOfVerification: Sterile packs are kept in clean, dust free, moist free environment.

checkpoint.name: Autoclaved linen and Dressing are used for procedure
checkpoint.meansOfVerification: Gowns, draw sheets , Cotton, Gauze, bandages.etc.

checkpoint.name: Cleaning of instruments after use
checkpoint.meansOfVerification:
Ask staff how they clean the instruments like ambubag, suction canulae, Surgical Instruments 
(Soaking in 0.5% Chlorine Solution, Wiping with 0.5% Chlorine Solution or 70% Alcohol as applicable )

checkpoint.name: Decontamination of operating & Procedure surfaces
checkpoint.meansOfVerification:
Ask staff about how they decontaminate the procedure surface like OT Table, Stretcher/Trolleys etc. 
(Wiping with .5% Chlorine solution)

checkpoint.name: Staff know how to make disinfectant solution
checkpoint.meansOfVerification: Carbolic acid, chlorine solution, glutaraldehyde or any other disinfectant used

checkpoint.name: Proper handling of Soiled and infected linen
checkpoint.meansOfVerification: No sorting ,Rinsing or sluicing at Point of use/ sterile area

checkpoint.name: Check sterile field is maintained during surgery
checkpoint.meansOfVerification: Surgical site covered with sterile drapes, sterile instruments are kept within the sterile field.

checkpoint.name: Proper cleaning of procedure site with antisepsis
checkpoint.meansOfVerification: like before giving IM/IV injection, drawing blood, putting Intravenous and urinary catheter

checkpoint.name: Availability of Antiseptic Solutions
checkpoint.meansOfVerification: Povidine iodine solution

checkpoint.name: Staff aware of when to hand wash
checkpoint.meansOfVerification: Ask for 5 moments of hand washing

checkpoint.name: Use of antibiotic soap/liquid
checkpoint.meansOfVerification: Check adequate quantity of antibiotic soap/Chlorhexidine solution is available and used.

checkpoint.name: Adherence to Surgical scrub method
checkpoint.meansOfVerification:
Procedure should be repeated several times so that the scrub lasts for 3 to 5
minutes. Hands must always be kept above elbow level. The hands and forearms should be dried with a sterile towel only.

checkpoint.name: Adequate preparation for surgical scrub.
checkpoint.meansOfVerification: Check Finger nails of staff. They should not reach beyond finger tip. No nail polish or artificial nails. All jewelry on the fingers, wrists and arms should be removed. Adjust water to a comfortable temperature.

checkpoint.name: Availability of elbow operated taps
checkpoint.meansOfVerification: elbow /foot operated or sensor

checkpoint.name: Availability of hand washing with running Water Facility at Point of Use
checkpoint.meansOfVerification: Check for availability of wash basin near the point of use Ask to Open the tap. Ask Staff water supply is regular

checkpoint.name: Availability of antiseptic soap with soap dish/ liquid antiseptic with dispenser.
checkpoint.meansOfVerification: Check for availability/ Ask staff if the supply is adequate and uninterrupted.

checkpoint.name: Display of Hand washing Instruction at Point of Use
checkpoint.meansOfVerification: Prominently displayed above the hand washing facility , preferably in Local language

checkpoint.name: Hand washing sink is wide and deep enough to prevent splashing and retention of water
checkpoint.meansOfVerification: Tap should be approx. 96 cm from the ground.

checkpoint.name: Quality circle has been formed in the operation theatre
checkpoint.meansOfVerification: Check if quality circle formed and functional in the OT

checkpoint.name: There is system of daily round by matron/hospital manager/ hospital superintendent/ OT in charge for monitoring of services
checkpoint.meansOfVerification: Check for entries in Round Register.

checkpoint.name: Departmental checklist are used for monitoring and quality assurance
checkpoint.meansOfVerification: Staff is designated for filling and monitoring of these checklists

checkpoint.name: C-Section Audits are done on Monthly Bases
checkpoint.meansOfVerification: Check with audit records

checkpoint.name: Internal assessment is done at periodic interval
checkpoint.meansOfVerification: Check for assessment records such as circular, assessment plan and filled checklists. Internal assessment should be done at least quarterly

checkpoint.name: Action plan prepared
checkpoint.meansOfVerification: with details of action to be taken, responsibility, time line and Feedback mechanism.

checkpoint.name: Non Compliance are enumerated and recorded
checkpoint.meansOfVerification: Check points having scores partial and Non Compliances are listed

checkpoint.name: Check correction & corrective actions are taken
checkpoint.meansOfVerification: Check actions have been taken to close the gap. Can be in form of Action taken report or Quality Improvement (PDCA) project report

checkpoint.name: Processes are improved & implemented
checkpoint.meansOfVerification: Look for the improvements made in the critical process.

checkpoint.name: Non value adding activities are identified
checkpoint.meansOfVerification: Non value adding activities are wastes. In these steps resources are expended, delays occur, and no value is added to the service.

checkpoint.name: Process mapping of critical processes done
checkpoint.meansOfVerification: Critical process are the ones where is some problem-delays, errors, cost, time, etc. and improvement will make our process effective and efficient.

checkpoint.name: Basic quality improvement method
checkpoint.meansOfVerification: PDCA & 5S

checkpoint.name: 7 basic tools of Quality
checkpoint.meansOfVerification: Minimum 2 applicable tools are used in each department

checkpoint.name: Department has documented procedure for general patient care processes
checkpoint.meansOfVerification: Check SOP for adequacy

checkpoint.name: Department has documented procedure for ensuring patients rights including consent, privacy, confidentiality & entitlement
checkpoint.meansOfVerification: Check SOP for adequacy

checkpoint.name: Department has documented procedure for specific processes to the department
checkpoint.meansOfVerification: Check SOP for adequacy

checkpoint.name: Department has documented procedure for support services & facility management.
checkpoint.meansOfVerification: Check SOP for adequacy

checkpoint.name: Department has documented procedure for quality management & improvement
checkpoint.meansOfVerification: Check SOP for adequacy

checkpoint.name: Department has documented procedure for data collection, analysis & use for improvement
checkpoint.meansOfVerification: Check SOP for adequacy

checkpoint.name: Department has documented procedure for infection control & bio medical waste management
checkpoint.meansOfVerification: Check SOP for adequacy

checkpoint.name: Department has documented procedure for safety & risk management
checkpoint.meansOfVerification: Check SOP for adequacy

checkpoint.name: Standard operating procedure for department has been prepared and approved
checkpoint.meansOfVerification: Can be prepared by junior surgeon and approved by HOD/OT in charge

checkpoint.name: Current version of SOP are available with process owner
checkpoint.meansOfVerification: Look for version.

checkpoint.name: Check staff is a aware of relevant part of SOPs
checkpoint.meansOfVerification: Ask staff how they carry out a specific activity.

checkpoint.name: Work instruction/clinical protocols are displayed
checkpoint.meansOfVerification: processing and sterilization of equipment's,

checkpoint.name: Check if SMART Quality Objectives have framed
checkpoint.meansOfVerification: Check short term valid quality objectivities have been framed addressing key quality issues in each department and cores services. Check if these objectives are Specific, Measurable, Attainable, Relevant and Time Bound.

checkpoint.name: Check of staff is aware of Mission , Values, Quality Policy and objectives
checkpoint.meansOfVerification: Interview with staff for their awareness. Check if Mission Statement, Core Values and Quality Policy is displayed prominently in local language at Key Points

checkpoint.name: Check periodic assessment of medication and patient care safety risk is done using defined checklist periodically
checkpoint.meansOfVerification: Verify with the records. A comprehensive risk assessment of all clinical processes should be done using pre define criteria at least once in three month.

checkpoint.name: Operation Cancellation rates
checkpoint.meansOfVerification: No. of cancelled operation*1000 /total operation done

checkpoint.name: No of drug stock out in the month
Downtime critical equipment
checkpoint.meansOfVerification: Sum total of time Elapsed between when equipment had problem and when the problem is sorted out for critical equipment.

checkpoint.name: Percentage of elective C-Sections
checkpoint.meansOfVerification: No. of elective LSCS x 100/Total LSCS (Elective + Emergency)

checkpoint.name: No of C-Section per OBG surgeon
checkpoint.meansOfVerification: Total number of C-Section done/No. of OBG Surgeon available

checkpoint.name: Percentage of C-Sections done in the night
checkpoint.meansOfVerification: Total C-Section done in night x 100/Total surgeries conducted (Day Night)

checkpoint.name: C-Section Rate
checkpoint.meansOfVerification: Total LSCS done x 100/Total deliveries conducted (Normal +LSCS)

checkpoint.name: Percentage of C-Sections conducted using Safe Surgery Checklist
checkpoint.meansOfVerification: No. of C- Section Conducted using safe surgery checklist *100/Total no. C-Section Conducted

checkpoint.name: % of environmental swab culture reported positive
checkpoint.meansOfVerification: No. of swab culture reported positive x 100/Total no. of swab sent for culture

checkpoint.name: Surgical Site infection Rate
checkpoint.meansOfVerification: No. of observed surgical site infections*100/total no. of Major surgeries

checkpoint.name: Perioperative Death Rate
checkpoint.meansOfVerification: Deaths occurred from pre operative procedure to discharge of the patient

checkpoint.name: No of adverse events per thousand patients
checkpoint.meansOfVerification: No of Adverse events reported x 1000/total no of patient treated in OT

checkpoint.name: Availability of Post Partum IUD insertion services
checkpoint.meansOfVerification: Verify with records that PPIUD services have been offered in labour room

checkpoint.name: Availability of New born resuscitation
checkpoint.meansOfVerification: Check if labour room has a functional New born resuscitation services available in labour room

checkpoint.name: Availability of Essential new born care
checkpoint.meansOfVerification: Check essential newborn care provisions such as Keeping baby on mother's abdomen, immediate drying of baby, Skin to skin contact, delayed chord clamp, initiation of breast feeding, recording of vitals and Vit. K are provided

checkpoint.name: Management of Postpartum Haemorrhage
checkpoint.meansOfVerification: Check if Medical /Surgical management of PPH is being done at labour room

checkpoint.name: Septic Delivery & Delivery of HIV positive Pregnant Women
checkpoint.meansOfVerification: Check if infected delivery cases are managed at labour room and not referred to higher centres unnecessarily

checkpoint.name: Availability of Vaginal Delivery services
checkpoint.meansOfVerification: Normal vaginal & assisted (Vacuum / Forcep ) delivery

checkpoint.name: Availability of Pre term delivery services
checkpoint.meansOfVerification: Check if pre term delivery are being conducted at facility and not referred to higher centres unnecessarily

checkpoint.name: Management of Retained Placenta
checkpoint.meansOfVerification: Check staff manages retained placenta cases in labour room . Verify with records

checkpoint.name: Management of PIH/Eclampsia/ Pre eclampsia
checkpoint.meansOfVerification: Check services for management of PIH/ Eclampsia are being proved at labour room

checkpoint.name: 24 *7 Availability of point of care diagnostic tests
checkpoint.meansOfVerification: HIV, Hb% , Random blood sugar , Protein Urea Test

checkpoint.name: Labour room service is functional 24X7
checkpoint.meansOfVerification: Verify with records that deliveries have been conducted in night on regular basis

checkpoint.name: IEC Material is displayed
checkpoint.meansOfVerification: Breast feeding, kangaroo care, family planning etc (Pictorial and chart ) in circulation & waiting area

checkpoint.name: Availability of departmental signage's
checkpoint.meansOfVerification: Numbering, main department and internal sectional signage, Restricted area signage displayed. Directional signages are given from the entry of the facility

checkpoint.name: Necessary Information regarding services provided is displayed
checkpoint.meansOfVerification: Name of doctor and Nurse on duty are displayed and updated. Contact details of referral transport / ambulance displayed

checkpoint.name: Signage's and information are available in local language
checkpoint.meansOfVerification: Check all information for patients/ visitors are available in local language

checkpoint.name: Check all services including drugs, consumables, diagnostics and blood are free of cost in labour room
checkpoint.meansOfVerification:
Check if there are no user charges of any services in labour room .
Ask Pregnant women and their attendants if they have not paid for any services or any informal fees to service providers

checkpoint.name: Patient Records are kept at secure place beyond access to general staff/visitors
checkpoint.meansOfVerification: Check records are not lying in open and there is designated space for keeping records with limited access. Records are not shared with anybody without permission of hospital administration

checkpoint.name: Curtains / frosted glass have been provided at windows
checkpoint.meansOfVerification: Check all the windows are fitted with frosted glass or curtains have been provided

checkpoint.name: Availability of screen/ partition at delivery tables
checkpoint.meansOfVerification: Screens / Partition has been provided from three side of the delivery table or Cubicle for ensuring visual privacy

checkpoint.name: No two women are treated on common bed/ Delivery Table
checkpoint.meansOfVerification: Check that observation beds and delivery tables are not shared by multiple women at the same time because of any reason

checkpoint.name: HIV status of patient is not disclosed except to staff that is directly involved in care
checkpoint.meansOfVerification: Check if HIV status of pregnant women is not explicitly written on case sheets and avoiding any means by which they can be identified in public such as labelling or allocating specific beds.

checkpoint.name: Pregnant women is not left unattended or ignored during care in the labour room
checkpoint.meansOfVerification: Check that care providers are attentive and empathetic to the pregnant women at no point of care they are left alone.

checkpoint.name: Care provided at labour room is free from physical abuse or harm
checkpoint.meansOfVerification: Check if the physical abuse practices such as pinching, slapping, restraining , pushing on the abdomen, extensive episiotomy etc.

checkpoint.name: Behavior of labour room staff is dignified and respectful
checkpoint.meansOfVerification: Check that labour staff is not providing care in undignified manner such as yelling, scolding , shouting, blaming and using abusive language, unnecessary touching or examination

checkpoint.name: Pregnant women is explicitly informed before examination and procedures
checkpoint.meansOfVerification: Check if care providers verbally inform the pregnant women before touching, examination or starting procedure.

checkpoint.name: Consent is taken before delivery and or shifting
checkpoint.meansOfVerification: Check the labour room case sheet for consent has been taken

checkpoint.name: Labour room has system in place to involve patient's relative in decision making about pregnant women treatment
checkpoint.meansOfVerification: Check if pregnant women and her family members have been informed and consulted before shifting the patient for C-Section or referral to higher center

checkpoint.name: Only on duty staff is allowed in the labour room when it is occupied
checkpoint.meansOfVerification: Pregnant woman, her birth companion, doctor, nurse/ANM on duty, and other support staff only, is allowed in the labour room

checkpoint.name: Availability of ramps and railing & Labour room is located at ground floor
checkpoint.meansOfVerification: If not located on the ground floor availability of the ramp / lift with person for shifting

checkpoint.name: Availability of Wheel chair or stretcher for easy Access to the labour room
Check care to pregnant women is not denied or differed due to discrimination
checkpoint.meansOfVerification: Discrimination may happen because of religion, caste, ethnicity, cast, language, paying capacity and educational level.

checkpoint.name: Labour room does not have temporary connections and loosely hanging wires
checkpoint.meansOfVerification: Switch Boards other electrical installations are intact. Check adequate power outlets have been provided as per requirement of electric appliances

checkpoint.name: Check if safety features have been provided in infrastructure
checkpoint.meansOfVerification:
The floor of the labour room complex should be made of anti-skid material. 
Each window have 2-panel sliding
doors. The outside panel be fixed The second panel should be moving with frosted glass and a lock.

checkpoint.name: Non structural components are properly secured
checkpoint.meansOfVerification: Check for fixtures and furniture like cupboards, cabinets, and heavy equipment , hanging objects are properly fastened and secured

checkpoint.name: Labour room staff is provided refresher training
checkpoint.meansOfVerification: Check with training records the labour room staff have been provided refresher training at lest once in every 12 month on Intrapartum care, Identification and & management of obstetric emergencies and Essential Newborn care & Breast feeding support

checkpoint.name: Check for competence assessment is done at least once in a year
checkpoint.meansOfVerification: Check for records of competence assessment using OSCE including filled checklist, scoring and grading . Verify with staff for actual competence assessment done

checkpoint.name: Navjat Shishu Surkasha Karyakarm (NSSK) training & Skilled birth Attendant (SBA)
checkpoint.meansOfVerification: Check training records

checkpoint.name: Training on Quality Management
checkpoint.meansOfVerification: Assessment, action planning, PDCA, 5S & use of checklist

checkpoint.name: Biomedical Waste Management& Infection control and hand hygiene ,Patient safety
checkpoint.meansOfVerification: Check training records

checkpoint.name: Training on Respectful Maternal Care
checkpoint.meansOfVerification: Check training records

checkpoint.name: Check parameters for assessing skills and proficiency of clinical staff has been defined
checkpoint.meansOfVerification: Check objective checklist such OSCE (Onsite Clinical Examination) defined Dakshta program are available at the labor room

checkpoint.name: Emergency Drug Tray is maintained
checkpoint.meansOfVerification: Inj Magsulf 50%, Inj Calcium gluconate 10%, Inj Dexamethasone, inj Hydrocortisone Succinate, Inj Ampicillin, Inj Gentamicin, inj metronidazole, , Inj diazepam, inj Pheniramine maleate, inj Corboprost, Inj Pentazocine, Inj Promethazine, Betamethasone, Inj Hydralazine, Nifedipine, Methyldopa,ceftriaxone

checkpoint.name: Availability of dressings material and Sanitary pads
checkpoint.meansOfVerification: Gauze piece and cotton swabs, sanitary Napkins (2 for Each Delivery), Sanitary Pads (4 for each delivery, needle (round body and cutting), chromic catgut no. 0, antiseptic solution

checkpoint.name: Availability of syringes and IV Sets /tubes and consumables for newborn
checkpoint.meansOfVerification: Paediatric IV sets,urinery catheter, Gastric tube and cord clamp, Baby ID tag

checkpoint.name: Availability of uterotonic Drugs
checkpoint.meansOfVerification: Inj Oxytocin 10 IU (to be kept in fridge) Tab Misoprostol 200mg

checkpoint.name: Availability of Vitamins
checkpoint.meansOfVerification: Vit K

checkpoint.name: Availability of IV Fluids
checkpoint.meansOfVerification: IV fluids, Normal saline, Ringer lactate,

checkpoint.name: Availability of Anti-infective Drugs
checkpoint.meansOfVerification: Cap Ampicillin 500mg, Tab Metronidazole 400mg, Inj Gentamicin

checkpoint.name: Availability of Antihypertensive , analgesic and antipyretic and Anesthetic drugs
checkpoint.meansOfVerification: Nifedipine, Methyldopa, Inj Hydralazine, Tab Paracetamol, Tab Ibuprofen, Inj Xylocaine 2%,

checkpoint.name: Availability of Mattress for each Labour Beds
checkpoint.meansOfVerification: Mattress should be in three parts and seamless in each part with a thin cushioning at the joints, detachable at perineal end. It should be washable and water proof with extra set.

checkpoint.name: Availability of Labour Beds with attachment/accessories
checkpoint.meansOfVerification:
Each labor bed should be have following facilities 
 Adjustable side rails, Facilities for Trendelenburg/reverse positions, Facilities for height adjustment, Stainless steel IV rod, wheels & brakes ,Steel basins attachment, Calf support, handgrip, legs support.

checkpoint.name: Availability of equipment for storage for drugs
checkpoint.meansOfVerification: Refrigerator, Movable Crash cart/Drug trolley, instrument trolley, dressing trolley

checkpoint.name: Availability of resuscitation Instruments for Newborn & Mother
checkpoint.meansOfVerification:
Availability of Neonatal Resuscitation Kit Pediatric resuscitator bag (volume 250 ml) with masks of
0 and 1 size for each Radiant warmer 
Adult Resuscitation Kit

checkpoint.name: Availability of Diagnostic Instruments
checkpoint.meansOfVerification: Atleast 2 Glucometers, Protien Urea Test Kit , HB Testing Kits, HIV Kits.

checkpoint.name: Availability of functional Equipment &Instruments for examination & Monitoring
checkpoint.meansOfVerification: One set of Digital BP apparatus, Stethoscope, Adult Thermometer , Baby Thermometer, baby forehead thermometer, Handheld Fetal Doppler , Fetoscope, baby weighting scale, Measuring Tape for four labour tables or at least two sets., Wall clock

checkpoint.name: Availability of instruments arranged for MVA/EVA tray
checkpoint.meansOfVerification: Speculum, anterior vaginal wall retractor, posterior wall retractor, sponge holding forceps, MVA syringe, cannulas, MTP, cannulas, small bowl of antiseptic lotion, are present in tray

checkpoint.name: Availability of Radiant Warmers
checkpoint.meansOfVerification: 1 Functional Radiant warmer for each four tables

checkpoint.name: Availability of instruments arranged for PPIUCD tray
checkpoint.meansOfVerification: PPIUCD insertion forceps, CuIUCD 380A/Cu IUCD375 in sterile package are present in tray

checkpoint.name: Availability of Baby tray
checkpoint.meansOfVerification: Two pre warmed towels/sheets for wrapping the baby, mucus extractor, bag and mask (0 &1 no.), sterilized thread for cord/cord clamp, nasogastric tube are present in tray

checkpoint.name: Availability of Instruments arranged for Episiotomy trays
checkpoint.meansOfVerification: Episiotomy scissor, kidney tray, artery forceps, allis forceps, sponge holder, toothed forceps, needle holder,thumb forceps, are present in tray

checkpoint.name: Availability of instrument arranged in Delivery trays
checkpoint.meansOfVerification: Cord Cutting Scissor, Artery forceps, Cord clamp, Sponge holder, speculum, kidney tray, bowl for antiseptic lotion are present in tray

checkpoint.name: Delivery kits are in adequate numbers as per load
checkpoint.meansOfVerification: One autoclaved delivery tray for each table plus 4 extra trays

checkpoint.name: Availability of equipment for cleaning & sterilization
checkpoint.meansOfVerification: Buckets for mopping, Separate mops for labour room and circulation area duster, waste trolley, Deck brush, Autoclave

checkpoint.name: Check for staff competencies for operating fire extinguisher and what to do in case of fire
checkpoint.meansOfVerification: Check staff is aware of RACE (Rescue-Alarm-Contain-Extinguish) method for in case of fire and confident in using fire extinguisher.

checkpoint.name: Labour room has installed fire Extinguishers & expiry is displayed on each fire extinguisher
checkpoint.meansOfVerification: Class A , Class B, C type or ABC type. Check the expiry date for fire extinguishers are displayed on each extinguisher as well as due date for next refilling is clearly mentioned

checkpoint.name: Labour room has sufficient fire exit to permit safe escape to its occupant at time of fire
checkpoint.meansOfVerification: Check the fire exits are clearly visible and routes to reach exit are clearly marked.

checkpoint.name: Adequate space as per delivery load
checkpoint.meansOfVerification: Labour tables should be placed in a way that there is a distance of at least 3 feet from the sidewall, at least 2 feet from head end wall, and at least 6’ from the second table

checkpoint.name: Availability of functional telephone and Intercom Services
checkpoint.meansOfVerification: Check availability of functional telephone and intercom connections

checkpoint.name: Availability of patients amenities such as Drinking water, Toilet & Changing area
checkpoint.meansOfVerification:
Dedicated Toilets for Labour Room area and Staff Rooms. LDR concept for Labour Room should have attached toilet with each LDR unit . Toilets are provided with western style toilet seats. Drinking water Facility within labour room
For Pregnant women & companion

checkpoint.name: Dedicated nursing station and Duty Rooms
checkpoint.meansOfVerification:
One common Nursing station for Conventional Labour Room 
Dedicated Nursing station for Each unit if LDR concept is followed

checkpoint.name: Labour Room layout is arranged in LDR concept
checkpoint.meansOfVerification: Labour Room and associated services are arranged according to Labour-Delivery-Recovery Concepts with each LDR unit comprising of 4 Labour Beds and dedicated Nursing Station and New Born Corner

checkpoint.name: Availability of Registration Area & Waiting area
checkpoint.meansOfVerification: Dedicated reception and registration area the entry of Labour Room Complex with registration desk and seating arrangement for 30 people in waiting area

checkpoint.name: Availability of Staff Room & Doctor's Duty Room
checkpoint.meansOfVerification: Dedicated rooms for Nursing staff and Doctors provided with beds, storage furniture and attached toilets

checkpoint.name: Availability of Storage Area
checkpoint.meansOfVerification:
A dedicated sub store with cabinets and storage racks for storing supplies 
Separate Clean room & Dirty Utility room for Storing Sterile and Used goods respectively

checkpoint.name: Availability of Newborn Care area
checkpoint.meansOfVerification: One Dedicated Newborn care area for each four tables. Incase of LDR dedicated NBCA for each unit.There should be no obstruction between labour table and Newborn corner for swift shifting of newborn requiring resuscitation Radiant Warmer Should have free space from three sides

checkpoint.name: Availability of Triage and Examination Area
checkpoint.meansOfVerification:
Dedicated Triage & Examination room with two examination beds for segregation of High & Low Risk patients 
Entry to the labour room should not be direct. Check if there is any buffer area

checkpoint.name: Labour room is in Proximity and function linkage with OT & SNCU
checkpoint.meansOfVerification: Check labour room is located in the proximity of Maternity OT and SNCU/ NICU in one block only with means of swift shifting of patients in case of emergency. If located on different floor lift/ ramp with manned trolley should be provided

checkpoint.name: Unidirectional flow of care
checkpoint.meansOfVerification: Labour room lay out and arrangement of services are designed in a way, that there is no criss cross movement of patient, staff, supplies & equipment

checkpoint.name: Corridors connecting labour room are broad enough to manage stretcher and trolleys
checkpoint.meansOfVerification: Corridor should be wide enough that 2 stretcher can pass simultaneously without any hassle

checkpoint.name: Availability of labour tables as per delivery load
checkpoint.meansOfVerification:
Less than 20 Deliveries/ Month -1
20-99 Deliveries/ Month - 2
100- 199 Deliveries/Month -4
200- 499 Deliveries/Month -6
More than 500 Deliveries-
Conventional Labour Room - Monthly Delivery Cases X 0.014
(Labour- Delivery-Recovery) LDR format - Monthly Delivery Cases X.028

checkpoint.name: Availability of Nursing staff /ANM
checkpoint.meansOfVerification:
Deliveries Per month-
100-200- 8
200-500 -12 
> 500 - 16

checkpoint.name: Availability of house keeping staff & Security Guards
checkpoint.meansOfVerification:
Housekeeping Staff as per delivery load 
100-200- 4
200-500 - 8 
Security Guards as per Delivery Load 
> 500 - 12 
100-200- 4
200-500 - 6
> 500 - 8

checkpoint.name: Availability of Ob&G specialist
checkpoint.meansOfVerification:
100-200 Deliveries -1 (OBG/EMOC)
200 - 500 Deliveries - 1 OBG (Mandatory + 4 (OBG/EMOC)
>500 3 OBG + 4 EMOC

checkpoint.name: Availability of Pediatrician
checkpoint.meansOfVerification: At least 1 pediatrician

checkpoint.name: Availability of General duty doctor
checkpoint.meansOfVerification: At least 4 Medical Officers

checkpoint.name: There is no overcrowding in labour room
checkpoint.meansOfVerification: Visitors are restricted at labour room. One birth companion is allowed to stay with the Pregnant women

checkpoint.name: Ask female staff whether they feel secure at work place
checkpoint.meansOfVerification: Check adequate security measures have been taken for safety and security of staff working in labour room

checkpoint.name: Security arrangement in labour room
checkpoint.meansOfVerification: Dedicated security guards preferably female security staff. CCTV Camera at entrance / circulation areas

checkpoint.name: Temperature control and ventilation in patient care area
checkpoint.meansOfVerification: Temperature of the labour room should be kept around 26-28 degree C ,labour complex should have split ACs with tonnage = (square root of area)/10 and one ceiling mounted fan for every labour table . Area should be drought free

checkpoint.name: Adequate Illumination at delivery table & observation area
checkpoint.meansOfVerification:
Labour Area - 500 Lux 
Support Area - 150 Lux

checkpoint.name: Availability of power back up in labour room
checkpoint.meansOfVerification: Check for 24X7 availability of power backup including Dedicated UPS and emergency light

checkpoint.name: Availability of 24x7 running and portable water
checkpoint.meansOfVerification: Availability of 24X7 Running water & hot water facility.

checkpoint.name: There is procedure for replenishing drug tray /crash cart
checkpoint.meansOfVerification: There is no stock out of drugs

checkpoint.name: Empty and filled cylinders are labelled and updated
checkpoint.meansOfVerification: Empty and filled cylinders are kept separately and labelled, flow meter is working and pressure/ flow rate is updated in the checklist

checkpoint.name: Drugs are stored in containers/tray/crash cart and are labelled
checkpoint.meansOfVerification: Check drugs and consumables are kept at allocated space in Crash cart/ Drug trolleys and are labelled. Look alike and sound alike drugs are kept seprately

checkpoint.name: There is practice of calculating and maintaining buffer stock
checkpoint.meansOfVerification: At least one week of minimum buffer stock is maintained all the time in the labour room. Minimum stock and reorder level are calculated based on consumption in a week accordingly

checkpoint.name: Department maintained stock and expenditure register of drugs and consumables
checkpoint.meansOfVerification: Check stock and expenditure register is adequately maintained

checkpoint.name: Expiry dates' are maintained at emergency drug tray / Crash cart
checkpoint.meansOfVerification:
Expiry dates against drugs are mentioned crash cart/ emergency drug tray 
No expiry drug found

checkpoint.name: There is established system of timely indenting of consumables and drugs
checkpoint.meansOfVerification:
Stock level are daily updated
Requisition are timely placed well before reaching the stock out level. 
Check with stock and indent registers.

checkpoint.name: Temperature of refrigerators are kept as per storage requirement and records are maintained
checkpoint.meansOfVerification: Check for temperature charts are maintained and updated periodically. Refrigerators meant for storing drugs should not be used for storing other items such as eatables

checkpoint.name: Availability & use of clean linen
checkpoint.meansOfVerification:
Clean Delivery gown is provided to Pregnant Women & 
sterile drape for baby.

checkpoint.name: There is system to check the cleanliness and Quantity of the linen
checkpoint.meansOfVerification: Quantity of linen is checked before sending it to laundry. Cleanliness & Quantity of linen is checked received from laundry. Records are maintained

checkpoint.name: Up to date instructions for operation and maintenance of equipments are readily available with labour room staff.
checkpoint.meansOfVerification: Check operating and trouble shooting instructions of equipment such as radiant warmer are available at labour room

checkpoint.name: All the measuring equipments/ instrument are calibrated
checkpoint.meansOfVerification: BP apparatus, thermometers, weighing scale , radiant warmer etc are calibrated . Check for records /calibration stickers

checkpoint.name: There is system of timely corrective break down maintenance of the equipments
checkpoint.meansOfVerification: Check for breakdown & Maintenance record in the log book

checkpoint.name: All equipments are covered under AMC including preventive maintenance
checkpoint.meansOfVerification: Check with AMC records/ Warranty documents

checkpoint.name: Staff posted in the labor room should not be rotated outside the labor room
checkpoint.meansOfVerification: Check with the duty roster

checkpoint.name: There is procedure to ensure that staff is available on duty as per duty roster
checkpoint.meansOfVerification: Check for system for recording time of reporting and relieving (Attendance register/ Biometrics etc)

checkpoint.name: Doctor, nursing staff and support staff adhere to their respective dress code
checkpoint.meansOfVerification: As per hospital administration or state policy

checkpoint.name: Interior & exterior of patient care areas are plastered & painted & building are white washed in uniform colour
checkpoint.meansOfVerification: Wall and Ceiling of Labour Room are painted in white colour. The walls of the labour room complex should be made of white wall tiles, with seamless joint, and extending up to the ceiling.

checkpoint.name: Toilets are clean with functional flush and running water
checkpoint.meansOfVerification: Check toilet seats, floors, basins etc are clean and water supply with functional cistern has been provided.

checkpoint.name: Floors, walls, roof, roof topes, sinks patient care and circulation areas are Clean
checkpoint.meansOfVerification: All area are clean with no dirt,grease,littering and cobwebs. Surface of furniture and fixtures are clean

checkpoint.name: No condemned/Junk material in the Labour room
checkpoint.meansOfVerification: Check of any obsolete article including equipment, instrument, records, drugs and consumables

checkpoint.name: Delivery table are intact and without rust & Mattresses are intact and clean
checkpoint.meansOfVerification: Observe for any signs for rusting or accumulation of dirt/ grease/ encrusted body fluid

checkpoint.name: Check for there is no seepage , Cracks, chipping of plaster Window panes , doors and other fixtures are intact
checkpoint.meansOfVerification: Check for delivery as well as auxiliary areas

checkpoint.name: No stray animal/rodent/birds
checkpoint.meansOfVerification: Check for no stray animal in and around labour room

checkpoint.name: Check staff is aware of the drug regime and doses as per STG
checkpoint.meansOfVerification: Check BHT that drugs are prescribed as per treatment protocols &Check for rational use of uterotonic drugs

checkpoint.name: Check for that relevant Standard treatment protocols are available at point of use
checkpoint.meansOfVerification: Intrapartum care, Essential newborn care, Newborn Resuscitation, Pre- Eclampsia, Eclampsia, Postpartum hemorrhage , Obstructed Labour, Management of preterm labour

checkpoint.name: Check for case sheet if drugs are prescribed under generic name only
checkpoint.meansOfVerification: Check all the drugs in case sheet and discharge slip are written in generic name only.

checkpoint.name: Death note is written as per mother & neonatal death review guidelines
checkpoint.meansOfVerification: Maternal and neonatal death are recorded as per MDR guideline. Death note including efforts done for resuscitation is noted in patient record. Death summary is given to patient attendant quoting the immediate cause and underlying cause if possible

checkpoint.name: There is established criteria for distinguishing between new-born death and still birth
checkpoint.meansOfVerification: Every still birth is examined, classified by paediatrician before declaration & record is maintained

checkpoint.name: There is procedure for admitting Pregnant women directly coming to Labour room
checkpoint.meansOfVerification: Admission is done by written order of a qualified doctor

checkpoint.name: There is no delay in admission of pregnant women in labour pain
checkpoint.meansOfVerification: Co relate the time admission with & clinical intervention (vital chart , partograph, medication given etc.)

checkpoint.name: Check how service provider cope with shortage of delivery tables due to high patient load
checkpoint.meansOfVerification: Provision of extra tables.

checkpoint.name: Unique identification number & patient demographic records are generated during process of registration & admission
checkpoint.meansOfVerification: Check for demographics like Name, age, Sex, Chief complaint, etc.

checkpoint.name: There is a procedure for consultation of the patient to other specialist with in the hospital
checkpoint.meansOfVerification: check if there are linkages and established process for calling other specialist in labour room if required

checkpoint.name: There is procedure of handing over patient / new born from labour room to OT/ Ward/SNCU
checkpoint.meansOfVerification: Hand over from Labour Room to the destination department is given while shifting the Mother & Baby. Shifting to ward should be done at least two hours after delivery in case of conventional LR and 4 hours in case of LDR

checkpoint.name: Nurse is assigned for each pregnant women
checkpoint.meansOfVerification: Check for nursing hand over

checkpoint.name: Advance communication regarding the patient's condition is shared with the higher center
checkpoint.meansOfVerification: The information regarding the case, expected time of arrival and special facilities such as specialist, blood, intensive care may be required is communicated to the higher center

checkpoint.name: Essential information regarding referral facilities are available at labour room
checkpoint.meansOfVerification:
Check for availability of following -
Referral Pathway
Names, Contact details and duty schedules for responsible persons higher referral centers
Name , Contact details, duty schedule of Ambulance services

checkpoint.name: Referral vehicle is being arranged
checkpoint.meansOfVerification:
Check labour room staff facilitates arrangement of ambulance for transferring the patient to higher center . Patient attendant are not asked to arrange vehicle by their own 
Check if labour room staff checks ambulance preparedness in terms of necessary equipments, drugs, accompanying staff in terms of care that may be required in transit

checkpoint.name: Patient referred with referral slip
checkpoint.meansOfVerification: A referral slip/ Discharge card is provided to patient when referred to another health care facility. Referral slip includes demographic details, History of woman, examination findings, management done , drugs administered, any procedure done, reason for referral, detail of referral center including whom to contact and signature of approving medical officer

checkpoint.name: Referral checklist & Referral in/ Out register is maintained all referred cases
checkpoint.meansOfVerification: Referral check list is filled before referral to ensure all necessary steps have been taken for safe referral including advance communication, transport arrangement, accompanying care provider, referral slip , time taken for referral etc. regarding referral cases including demographics, date & time of admission, date & time of referral, diagnosis at referral and follow up of outcome is recorded in referral register

checkpoint.name: Follow-up of referral cases is done
checkpoint.meansOfVerification: Check that labour room staff follow up of referred cases for timely arrival and appropriate care provided at higher center. Outcome and deficiencies if any should be recorded in referral out register.

checkpoint.name: Reason for referral is clearly stated and referral is authorized competent person (Gynaecologist or Medical Officer on duty)
checkpoint.meansOfVerification:
Verify with referral records that reasons for referral were clearly mentioned and rational. Referral is authorized by Gynaecologist or Medical officer on duty after ascertaining that case can not be managed at the facility 
Labor room staff confirms the suitability of referral with higher centers to ascertain that case can be managed at higher center and will not require further referrals

checkpoint.name: Check for the writing, It comprehendible by the clinical staff
checkpoint.meansOfVerification: Verify case sheets of sample basis

checkpoint.name: Every Medical advice and procedure is accompanied with date , time and signature
checkpoint.meansOfVerification: Verify case sheets of sample basis
